analysis.description:

	- assert(bool)(receiverNewBalance == receiverBalance + _value)
Parameter '_new' of Owned.setOwner (/unique_chucks/22/0xa8c65fc1d479a9a2fd2e8de0fe41bb45f459ef19.sol#337) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_token' of Token.transferERC20Token (/unique_chucks/22/0xa8c65fc1d479a9a2fd2e8de0fe41bb45f459ef19.sol#356-358) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of Token.transferERC20Token (/unique_chucks/22/0xa8c65fc1d479a9a2fd2e8de0fe41bb45f459ef19.sol#358-360) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of Token.transferERC20Token (/unique_chucks/22/0xa8c65fc1d479a9a2fd2e8de0fe41bb45f459ef19.sol#361-362) is not in mixedCase
